name: Espresso Delight
details: A pure shot of espresso made from high-quality Arabica beans, offering a bold and rich flavor.

name: Caramel Macchiato
details: A smooth espresso layered with steamed milk, vanilla syrup, and a touch of caramel.

name: Vanilla Latte
details: A perfect combination of espresso, steamed milk, and vanilla syrup for a sweet, mild coffee experience.

name: Mocha Madness
details: A delightful mix of rich espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate, topped with whipped cream.

name: Cappuccino Bliss
details: A balanced blend of espresso, steamed milk, and frothy foam, providing a strong yet creamy experience.

name: Iced Americano
details: A refreshing cold brew with a bold espresso flavor, perfect for hot days.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
details: A seasonal favorite with pumpkin spice, cinnamon, and steamed milk combined with espresso.

name: Hazelnut Cappuccino
details: A rich cappuccino with a touch of hazelnut flavor, topped with a creamy froth.

name: Dark Roast Brew
details: A full-bodied dark roast coffee with a strong and bitter profile, ideal for black coffee lovers.

name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
details: A sweet latte infused with cinnamon dolce syrup and topped with whipped cream and cinnamon sprinkles.
